Text: Can anyone PLEASE seed this?? and maybe "The Island" too? it is impossible to find lately.

Thank you so, so much for uploading this genius show! It's wildly appreciated! :-) I was at this show (not sure I was at this exact night that got filmed, but I was at one of the nights, and it's wodnerful to have a record of it like this.

And I second the request of AngelusDracul - it would be great to get The Island if that were at all possible... anyone out there have a copy..!??
